title: [Large-scale] Developing Second Language Writing Proficiency through Wiki-based Collaborative Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic second-language comprehension and simple sentence-construction ability
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones and participate in learning environments with limited PC accessibility. The goal is to improve individual writing skills through collaborative learning.

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers on wiki platforms to complete a subject-based expository essay
Learners can improve linguistic accuracy (grammar, vocabulary usage) in individual writing by 20% or more through collaborative processes
Learners can enhance the content quality of individual writing outputs to meet or exceed the top two levels of an assessment rubric by incorporating feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
